title: The developer shall abide by all the terms and conditions laid down in the Commencement Certificate and all N
clause_text: The developer shall abide by all the terms and conditions laid down in the Commencement Certificate and all N.O.C.s obtained by him while executing the scheme.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The developer shall abide by all the terms and conditions laid down in the Commencement Certificate and all N.O.C.s obtained by him while executing the scheme.
